"The company that sold Mortice the steel track later produced a similar vehicle based on the carrier's idea."  

Read: they screwed him.  Poor ol' Lloyd.

comment.author: 47691521@N07
comment._content: Thanks for sharing this photo with the commons! We've used it in an illustration for opensource.com opensource.com/life/10/2/acceleration-open-source-cars

comment.author: 20288302@N08
comment._content: This photo is mislabeled. That's my grandfather - Roy Byron Aler - on his rural postal route out of Harbor Springs, MI. Similar images and related newspaper clippings at: picasaweb.google.com/donorgan/ReSmithsonian#
